mapper.select: SELECT c.bameSeq, c.bameName, c.bameId, c.bamePw, c.bameGender, c.bameBirth, c.bameEmail, c.bameTel, c.bameZipCode, c.bameAddr, c.bameAddrDetail, c.bameGrade, c.bameRegDate, c.bameEditDate, c.bameTosNy, c.bameMktNy, c.bameDelNy FROM ba_member c LEFT JOIN ba_petprofile d ON c.bameSeq = d.BA_Member_bameSeq ORDER BY c.bameSeq desc

SELECT c.bameSeq, c.bameName, c.bameId, c.bamePw, c.bameGender, c.bameBirth, c.bameEmail, c.bameTel, c.bameZipCode, c.bameAddr, c.bameAddrDetail, c.bameGrade, c.bameRegDate, c.bameEditDate, c.bameTosNy, c.bameMktNy, c.bameDelNy FROM ba_member c WHERE 1 = 1 AND c.bameSeq = #{bameSeq}

mapper.update: UPDATE ba_member SET bameName = #{bameName}, bameId = #{bameId}, bamePw = #{bamePw}, bameGender = #{bameGender}, bameBirth = #{bameBirth}, bameEmail = #{bameEmail}, bameTel = #{bameTel}, bameZipCode = #{bameZipCode}, bameAddr = #{bameAddr}, bameAddrDetail = #{bameAddrDetail}, bameGrade = #{bameGrade}, bameEditDate = now(), bameTosNy = #{bameTosNy}, bameMktNy = #{bameMktNy}, bameDelNy = #{bameDelNy} WHERE 1 = 1 AND bameSeq = #{bameSeq}
